qas.question: Which lake is most popular for water sports in Armenia?
What international sports has Armenia done well at?

context: A wide array of sports are played in Armenia, the most popular among them being wrestling, weightlifting, judo, association football, chess, and boxing. Armenia's mountainous terrain provides great opportunities for the practice of sports like skiing and climbing. Being a landlocked country, water sports can only be practiced on lakes, notably <a0_0>Lake Sevan<a0_0/>. Competitively, Armenia has been successful in <a1_0>chess, weightlifting and wrestling<a1_0/> at the international level. Armenia is also an active member of the international sports community, with full membership in the Union of European Football Associations (UEFA) and International <a2_0>Ice Hockey Federation<a2_0/> (IIHF). It also hosts the <a3_0>Pan-Armenian Games<a3_0/>.
